question: Create a Deployment named 'nginx-deploy' with 3 replicas of the image 'mysql:5.7'.
suggested_answer:
kubectl create deployment nginx-deploy --image=mysql:5.7 --replicas=3

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-deploy
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-deploy
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-deploy
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: nginx-deploy
        image: mysql:5.7
